column4: does anyone know how gnome's alt-f2 works? I want a command that will pop up that dialogue, to replace xfrun4 (which is shit)
what's that supposed to do? I get A panel is already running.
I already have a gnome panel running: I'm only using xfwm4 because metacity is a shit window manager (doesn't do vertical/horizontal maximisation) and compiz doesn't work on my rage128
